channel.title: My maps
channel.description:
Okay, so I'm making a 3D game now with a program called "Realm Crafter". I'm really a horrible map maker, so my maps aren't very good.
These are the maps I currently have/made:
This is the begin map/castle. I'm stilling gonna fill it with more buildings/trees.
[URL=http://img508.imageshack.us/i/17744005.png/][IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/9002/17744005.th.png[/img][/URL]
This is the interior of a house. I'm gonna try to make more.
[URL=http://img856.imageshack.us/i/58769152.png/][IMG]http://img856.imageshack.us/img856/1675/58769152.th.png[/img][/URL]
What do you think about these maps? Any suggestions or something?

item.title: My maps
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

The Wanderer:

Try and make the walls seem more seamless on the castle.

Read full topic
